== Screencasts ==

=== What is a screencast? ===

Screencasts are short video clips which demonstrate visually how to do a specific task. 

=== What is requirement for this tutorial ===

I assume that you have RecordMyDesktop or any other application that creates ogg file installed and ogg files created.
I also assume that Mencoder is installed and you have required codecs present on the system.

== ogg to avi ==

On this page I will describe how to convert ogg file to theora with Mencoder.

=== What is a the basic command? ===

mencoder out.ogg -o out.avi -oac mp3lame -ovc lavc

=== How can you make it appear on the right click menu? ===

==== Open Nautilus ====

<nowiki>[[File:ogg2avi1.png]]</nowiki>

==== Make the screen look like this ====

<nowiki>[[File:ogg2avi2.png]]</nowiki>

You are done !! Right click on any ogg file created by RecordMyDesktop [url]https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ScreenCasts/RecordMyDesktop[/url] and you will have an option to convert it into AVI
